DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess ease deflation Titan® OTR pump .
DOC.brief_title: Titan® One Touch Release Inflatable Penile Prosthesis
DOC.criteria: Participant estimate life expectancy 5 year Participant diagnose erectile dysfunction ( impotence ) participant willing Titan OTR IPP implant Participant able willing complete followup visit procedure indicate protocol Participant unable unwilling sign Informed Consent Form /or comply followup requirement accord study protocol Participant previous penile prosthesis prior penile enlargement surgery Participant compromise immune system , systemic lupus erythematosus , discoid lupus , scleroderma Participant myocardial infarction coronary artery stent placement within 2 month prior treatment Participant currently uncontrolled severe diabetes disease significantly reduce wound heal ability Participant manual dexterity mental ability operate pump Participant chordee priapism Participant penile sensory neuropathy Participant serious bleeding disorder
